storyName: Upside Down on the Pale Sea
storyInfo: Thorns excavates a grave to find the sword technique he seeks, but is mistaken for a grave robber. Pascuala is also caught stealing. As the two are about to be hanged, a gang of bandits rushes the execution grounds, rescuing them and spiriting them away.

attributes.content: Pascuala! You made it. Here I was, thinking you were buried in the Flat.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: *Huff*...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You're as pale as the salt. Run into something on the way?
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: Shut up, Teach... Let me in already.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You wanna come in? Did you get what the boss asked for?
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: 'Course I did. Not just the compass, either. I got another big haul too.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Se√±ora Juana's been looking for an alchemist, and I've got a lead.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: So can I come in now?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Of course, Master Thief Pascuala. You honor my humble abode.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: Anchors aweigh, hoist the sails‚ô™
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: High winds roar, our clothes a-tore‚ô™
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Rain drowns our drunken haze, and lights our hearts ablaze‚ô™
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Ready, ho! Sail forth! A thousand ships break port!‚ô™
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man
Tottering Old Man
attributes.content: At dawn break we charge ahead‚ô™...

attributes.name: Tottering Old Man
attributes.content: Aaaahhhh! Who are you?! What're you doing in my house?!
attributes.joined: At dawn break we charge ahead‚ô™... Aaaahhhh! Who are you?! What're you doing in my house?!

attributes.content: This alley... is your house, se√±or?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That cardboard you've got on your head is my bed, joven...
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Sorry, I saw it by the garbage bin. Didn't think anyone wanted it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mind if I hide from the rain here? I'll go once it stops.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: This town hasn't seen a drop in over two months.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Even if it is going to rain, mind putting down my bed? Here, you can use my blanket.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: ...Thank you, se√±or.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: So what're you here for, √Ügir?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: I'm looking for a local sword technique. The legends say the ones who devised it were‚Äî
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Ahem. A few months ago, I heard about a technique that can 'fight the wind and waves', and decided to come here to learn it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That's mighty brave of you. Don't you know the Inquisition's been cracking down on pirates these days?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: I'm not interested in becoming a pirate. I just feel like my own swordsmanship's been lacking.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Swords are for cutting people down, not cutting through the waves. Besides, why'd you want to learn it anyway? Heading out to sea?
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Too many questions, se√±or.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: *Sigh* There's always folks believing such foolishness. If you'd come by half a year earlier, I could have brought you to the guy you're looking for.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Back in the day, he learned a thing or two from those pirates, always bragging about how he could chop up the sea itself. In the end, he was just like me. Came running back to town, waiting to die in peace and quiet.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: Did he leave anything behind?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: His diary? Took that to his grave. You'll have to dig it up yourself.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: If he knew someone wanted to learn the sword from him, he'd be so happy he'd jump right out, bones and all.
attributes.name: Tottering Old Man

attributes.content: With a shovel by his side, Isidro cracks open the coffin. He brushes aside the grains of salt that fell inside, exposing a lustrous, red-flushed corpse.
The corner of a book pokes out of its clothes.
Isidro gingerly pinches the book and pulls it away, doing everything he can to keep the flimsy paper‚Äîmade brittle by the salt‚Äîintact.
Is this the diary he mentioned?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's too tattered, I can't read a thing.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: *Cough* *Cough* *Cough*... Pfft‚Äîpleh!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Did I just inhale bits of paper...? Damn, that's salty.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I should look elsewhere.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Elsewhere? Where else would a wicked grave robber and cannibal such as yourself want to spread his evil?
Grave robber? Cannibal???
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I've been watching you creep about the cemetery, molesting its graves. I've caught you red-handed.
I can explain, se√±or.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: 'Se√±or'...? Do you not know who I am?!
Do you... happen to be a local celebrity?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I am a cleric of the Inquisition, in charge of inspecting the entry permits of all visitors at the town gates.
So if you don't know who I am, then how did you get in here?
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Guards! Arrest this man!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Are these petals crushed enough...?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Doctor A√±ora!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What? Oh! More or less, a few more times and you can start blending in the oil.
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: Why are your hands shaking?
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: You must be mistaken.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Taken? What was taken?
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: I said! You must be mistaken!!!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: About what? What are you on about? Still, that much shaking... Have you been drinking again?
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: You're the town calificador, you shouldn't be drinking. Wine is sinful and brings only harm, you said so yourself.
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: I may have had a few cups with the representative of the wine caravan as we talked business, but it was all for the sake of securing the town's future.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: How is the widow doing, Doctor?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The who now? Speak up!
attributes.name: A√±ora

attributes.content: The potter's widow! She's giving birth in a few days!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Gaining girth? And now gluttony, yet more sin.
attributes.name: A√±ora
Silver
attributes.content: I said!

attributes.name: Silver
attributes.content: The widow!!

attributes.name: Silver
attributes.content: Is giving birth!!!
attributes.joined: I said! The widow!! Is giving birth!!!

attributes.content: Se√±or Silver‚Äî!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Ah‚Äî! Dios mio, you scared me. Didn't I say to knock before you enter?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I heard you shouting and assumed you were in danger!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I, uh, aside from that... I have something to report.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We've captured a... a lunatic, a blasphemer in the cemetery east of town. He was stealing corpses in the cemetery.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I... I thought that with enough food, we could avoid such a tragedy happening again.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: If I may, Se√±or Silver, a full belly is not enough.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: When you first brought the holy Law to our town, you cleansed us of our sins. But now? Not only have your prohibitions been lifted, we have not heard your sermons in a very long time.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Sin flourishes once more. It is inescapable.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Is that what you think?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Which is precisely why you cannot allow this vile blasphemer to spread his evil in town!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...I shall arrange a sentencing.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What of Old Palo? He was seen talking to the blasphemer, for quite a while at that.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...No need. Palo may have associated with pirates in his youth, but he wouldn't have the nerve to break the law.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But‚Äî
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: I said there is no need.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Sir... I believe we should at least keep an eye on him.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We can discuss this later.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Digging up a grave? Don't tell me he was about to... you know...?
attributes.name: Frightened Townsperson

attributes.content: Sinner! A sinner! Aar√≥n is no longer pure... Calamity comes once more...
attributes.name: Hostile Townsperson

attributes.content: Padre, Calificador! I beg you, kill him! Cleanse his sins! Don't let us be visited by disaster again!
attributes.name: Hostile Townsperson

attributes.content: (Struggles)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Stop that!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Se√±or Isidro, is it true you were stealing from the graves of this town's residents in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I don't deny being at the cemetery, but I‚Äî
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What?!
Pascuala?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro, amigo, I never took you for a grave robber. Of all the things to steal, corpses? Really?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Makes me right sick, it does.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Might I remind you, Pascuala, that you're chained up too.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Silence, sinner! You'll be on trial next!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: What are you even doing here?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I... *sigh* Old habits.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: She's about to be executed?!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't blame me, that girl ran afoul of her bad habits. Barely out the door and she was already off to pick the pocket of the best dressed man in town.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: Who happened to be Calificador Silver.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: With her skills, not even the calificador would have noticed her.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: He didn't, but she was caught in the act by one of his priests giving a report.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: And what about that alchemist she mentioned?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: We know where he is.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: He's about to be hanged, right alongside her.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: So, how many of those priests do they have at the execution?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Twelve.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: ...With your crew, we should be able to handle them. Let's go.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Se√±oras y se√±ores, according to the laws of this town, these two criminals will be hanged by the neck until dead. I hope this will serve as a warning to all not to allow your souls to be tarnished by sin.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The time has come. Execute them.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: You don't look worried at all.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What's there to worry about?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You got a way out of this then?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Not at this exact moment, no, but it's all about the timing...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: The girl turns her head, looking to the side of the gallows. A warrior priest has his hand on the lever, ready to pull it.
(Waves his hand)
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Agh! My hand!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: B‚ÄîBandits! Bandits!
attributes.name: Frantic Townsperson

attributes.content: OhwhatsinshaveIcommittedtodeservesuchpunishmenthowshouldIatone...
attributes.name: Terrified Townsperson

attributes.content: Repel them! Protect the civilians! Cover Calificador Silver's retreat!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Forget me! Evacuate the citizens!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Charge, you lazy sons of saltfins, charge! Don't let those poor bastards bite the dust!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Yearrrgh!
attributes.name: Howling Sailor

attributes.content: Those bandits are here to rescue their friends!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Get in formation and stop them!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Die!
attributes.name: Sword-Wielding Sailor

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Impulsive Sailor

attributes.content: You dare plunder this town so brazenly?!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: We'll handle this lot, Javier! You save Pascuala and the boy, quicklike!
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: I owe you one.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't let them have their way!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Warrior Priests

attributes.content: Keep it quick! There's no time to waste!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Anyone gets in our way, cut them down!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Aye!
attributes.name: Howling Sailor

attributes.content: Grkh...
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Cut them loose, quick!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Menacing Sailor

attributes.content: Heh, took you guys long enough. Quick, get me out of these shackles, it's starting to chafe like you wouldn't believe.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Yeow! My wrists! You call this a rescue?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Hmph. Like I told the boss long ago, you're nothing but trouble.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And yet here you are, saving me from the gallows.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You too, chaval. Get moving.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Can I borrow a sword?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Here, catch.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't even think about running, boy!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: You expect me to lay down and die, se√±or?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Nice moves!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Muchas gracias.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hey! Is this really the time to get all buddy-buddy?! How're we getting out of here?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Shut your mouth and follow Teach. She knows an alley leading out of town.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: An alley? I guess that'll do...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Follow me!
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: They're heading south!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest A

attributes.content: South...? It's a sheer cliff. What're they up to?
attributes.name: Warrior Priest B

attributes.content: *Huff*... *Huff*... You're nuts. What alley?! That's a CLIFF!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: There's an alley if you jump down.
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: Please tell me she's joking, Javier.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Run faster! You'll need the speed to make the jump!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Silently speeds up)
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't tell me you're going along with this plan?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Any better ideas?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I think you've got brain problems, amigo.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: It's just ahead! Three, two, one‚ÄîJUMP!
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: With a decisive leap, the bandit jumps down the cliff, knocking loose some rocks that fall alongside her. After a long silence, a distant, muffled 'thump' can be heard coming from the bottom.
Pascuala watches bandit and boulder alike disappear off the cliff's edge, and gulps in fear.
Urk...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: It's a dead end up ahead, there's nowhere to run! Get them!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Jump already! They're about to catch up!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Pascuala looks at the cliff, then back at the warrior priests pursuing them.
No! I'd rather get cut down than jump!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Zip it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hey! Wh‚ÄîWhat are you doing?!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: With the girl tucked snugly under his arm, Isidro takes one last look back.
Then he sets his sights firmly ahead and leaps down the cliff, a screaming Pascuala in tow.
AHHHHHHHHH!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You lousy piece of finshit, I'll remember this‚Äî!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: In the midst of her panic, Pascuala feels herself land on something soft, quite unlike the solid ground she expected.
As she opens her eyes, she sees the giant cloth used to catch her.
We're safe now. They caught us with their sails.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Oh, there was... a boat... at the bottom of the cliff.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: She looks around. Enormous bones prop up the ship's wooden hull, while layer upon layer of canvas and finleather sails throng the masts, scattering the sun's light.
The fiery wind powers the complex of legs at the bottom of the hull through a complicated transmission system, the legs sending the ship scuttling over the salty soil with their powerful strokes.
Still calling yourself a Master Thief after that courageous display, Pascuala?
attributes.name: 'Ordinary' Townsperson

attributes.content: Hah, a good thief acts with thorough planning and caution, not reckless derring-do.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Stop gabbing with her and get changed, Teach. The helmsman's injured and I need you to take over.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Didn't like that outfit anyway. Way too tight around the bodice.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: *Huff*... *Huff*...
attributes.name: Menacing Sailor

attributes.content: Hm? What's that you're carrying?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Food and water!
attributes.name: Menacing Sailor

attributes.content: I spotted their granary earlier, so I snagged some in the chaos!
attributes.name: Menacing Sailor

attributes.content: Set it alight afore I left, too! Haha! They'll be too busy putting out the fire to worry about us.
attributes.name: Menacing Sailor

attributes.content: Not half bad, you bastard.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Now put your backs into it, ladies and gents! We reach home tomorrow night!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What're you looking at, chaval? You'll fall over the railing like that. First time in Mar P√°lido?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: This ship is... unusual. It's almost entirely wood and bone... Must be a lot lighter than the average landship.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course. Our salt ships are the only thing that can cross the Flat. If you tried it with those heavy iron beasts, they'd just get stuck in the salt.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Fascinating.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You don't look the least bit scared. Didn't you hear what the townsfolk called us?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Bandits.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You've got guts, saying it straight to my face.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I mean, you saved me from the gallows, didn't you?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Still, why run with us? The townies will brand you as one of us now.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...Do you know of a sword technique that will let you cut through the sea's wind and waves?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: A sword technique? You having a laugh?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: So none of you know?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Never heard of it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Where's your ship stopping?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You want off? No can do, I'm afraid. You're heading back with us.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...Sorry, but that's not in my plans.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Not my problem, chaval.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't say that. I'd rather not have to draw my sword against the ones who saved me.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I get that you're a dab hand with the blade, but...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Grkh...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You need to watch your back.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Heh, all these years as a thief, and not once has anyone spotted me as I make my move.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: That was enough dizzyleaf smoke to keep him asleep the entire trip.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Don't get cocky. So where's the compass the boss wanted? We put a lot of work into saving your sorry behinds, so don't disappoint us now.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: You wound me, se√±or. I've just delivered you more than just the compass.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Pouts) I got you my amigo over there too, didn't I?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: In fact, considering the added value, saving me's not enough. I'll need a little something extra to make it worth my while.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You think we're just gonna take your word for it that he's an alchemist? Wait til the boss checks him over afore you run your mouth again.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Fine by me. Whatever's meant to be in my pocket, will find its way there eventually.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Anyhow, where's the kitchen? I'm always a little peckish after staring death in the face.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Second floor of the stern.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Muchas gracias, O generous se√±or!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: AHHHHHHHHH!
attributes.name: Scared Warrior Priest

attributes.content: AAAAHHHHH‚Äî!
attributes.name: Scared Warrior Priest

attributes.content: I'm only going to remove the bone spines from the wound, not amputate your leg.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Only the most vicious of bandits would make barbed blades like this... The bleeding's stopped.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Scared Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Hold on a little while longer. I've already sent someone to get Doctor A√±ora. Once she's here, we can have a better look.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Be at ease, you seem fine. You'll be better after a few square meals.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Se√±or Calificador, we've put out the fire in the granary, but there's nothing left inside.
attributes.name: Sad Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...I'll think of a way to feed us.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What of the doctor? Her legs are not so good at her age. Did you not help her over?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: She's gone.
attributes.name: Sad Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Then where is sh‚ÄîWait, what? What happened?!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: She was knocked over by the bandits and hit the back of her head. She is... no longer with us.
attributes.name: Sad Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Se√±or Silver... Are you...?
attributes.name: Scared Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Did that hurt...? Sorry... Bear with it.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: She's giving birth, Silver! The widow's giving birth right now!
attributes.name: Anxious Townsperson

attributes.content: Might be because of the bandits' attack. Or not. Can we have the doctor see to her first?
attributes.name: Anxious Townsperson

attributes.content: ...Wait, where's the doctor?
attributes.name: Anxious Townsperson

attributes.content: Don't ask. I'll check on her myself.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Don't shake her. She won't be waking.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Se√±or, I... Se√±or, she... Se√±or, the child...
attributes.name: Anxious Townsperson

attributes.content: The child, too.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Se√±or, you...
attributes.name: Anxious Townsperson

attributes.content: Clerics, guard the bodies. We bury them tomorrow morning.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Prepare a burdenbeast. After the funerals, go and search for A√±ora's son. We must ask him to return, no matter what.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: This town needs a doctor.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: As I recall, she was teaching you some of her craft, was she not?
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: A man who has only just learned how to make ointment cannot be considered a doctor.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Otherwise, the widow and her child would not have died.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Now go, back to work.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Through the tightly closed shutters of their windows, the people of Aar√≥n can see a faint pink light floating through the fog-choked streets.
Silver does not know when it became dark. It feels like it was morning only minutes ago, when he was tidying up his robes for the execution.
But now, those robes are stained with blood. Not the blood of thieves or blasphemers, but of the townspeople.
Out of nowhere, he sees another faint pink light across the street.
A gaunt, lanky man with a bloody hole in his abdomen, large enough for him to see right through it.
The man calmly walks towards him, as if nothing was wrong.
Do you need assistance, se√±or?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: You look gravely wounded.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I am fine, Se√±or Calificador. You on the other hand, look most pale indeed.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I am an alguacil, newly transferred. Might you require my assistance?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Ahh‚Äî
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I must say, I didn't expect you to sleep so well hanging upside-down, joven.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: This sort of thing happens to me a lot. You get used to it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Your old shed's as good as new. Remember to thank Javier. It took him all night to fill in that tunnel of yours.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You could have saved him the effort if you just let me go.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Yet you're the one giving himself nothing but trouble by refusing to fix my compass. Do that, and you're free.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I told you, I don't know a thing about alchemy. That's not going to change, no matter how many times you ask.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Send him back to his shed. And skip the bread for his meals.
attributes.name: Juana
